ygData.subject: Re: possible big cheat for EQ....
ygData.msgSnippet: very ironic.  I post about how something might, but probably wouldn t, lead to what would be the biggest cheat in the game, to the EQCheats list mind you, and
ygData.messageBody:
very ironic. I post about how something might, but probably wouldn't, lead
to what would be the biggest cheat in the game, to the EQCheats list mind
you, and I get flamed and called a moron.

oh well.

I know very little about hacking, but I do know some, and I know it'd be
hard to hack EQ cause everything seems to be server side. The only way of
hacking I could think of would be to figure out the IP addy of the server
you play on, hack it yourself, edit your character after breaking any
encription on the file, getting off the server, and hopeing you didn't mess
anything big up or that Verant didn't notice you as that would be some large
law breaking for a game.

but, I know very little about hacking, do know some so this may be way out
there also :).

flame me silly I guess,
Omeg
